title: 5.1 Master Challenge 2
question:
The following pseudocode is used to find the sum of elements that are in the odd positions of a list.

Rewrite the above program such that the structure is maintained so as to display the sum of elements at the even positions of a list.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
